item.title: A Soulful Harmony of Prayers to Concert: The Road to UCCP Bradford's Main Sanctuary Restoration
item.description: UCCP Bradford’s “Huni sa Grasya ug Gugma” concert for a cause was held last February 24, 2024, at 6:00 pm at the IEC Convention Center. This was made for the restoration of UCCP Bradford Main Sanctuary.

item.title: Aiming for the Hoop, A Joyous 3rd Place Win for the MLBCSI's Basketball Team
item.description: The MLBCSI’s Basketball team placed 3rd in the overall finals for the South District 2 Meet.

item.title: Buwan ng Wika: Hearts Ablaze Toward Culture
item.description: “Buhay pa ba ang alab sa puso mo?” A touching inquiry from the movie GomBurZa, directed by Pepe Diokno, asked. This thought-provoking question challenges the hearts of the Filipinos. It pushes us to question how close we are to the tapestry of our heritage. The first event of the school year, Buwan ng Wika, reminds us of our culture and identity.

item.title: Buwan Ng Wika: Igniting Patriotism
item.description: On August 31, 2023, Matilda L. Bradford Christian School Inc. celebrated Buwan ng Wika with the participation of students, parents, and faculty. ⁤⁤From the Lakan and Lakambini pageant to the Sabayang Pagbikas competition, the festivity encourages the preservation of Filipino heritage.

item.title: Buwan ng Wika: The Passion of the Filipino
item.description: The Buwan ng Wika is a special time in all of the Philippines where everyone wears the traditional attire of the Philippines. It is a month to celebrate our culture. A month to appreciate ourselves and our language, Filipino. We hold this every year to commemorate our ancestors, and thank them for their service.

item.title: EDSA Revolution: A Rally to Remember
item.description: On February 22, 1986, the People Power Revolution, also known as the EDSA Revolution, occurred. It was a momentous time in history that showcased the power the people have when they get together and fight for it.

item.title: MLBCSI Celebrates its 28th Founding Anniversary
item.description: The highly awaited event of this school year has finally come. The Matilda L. Bradford Christian School celebrates its 28th Founding Anniversary and Intramurals starting February 11 - 16, 2024. The faculty and staff together with the Board of Trustees led the MLBCSI Sunday at United Church of Christ in the Philippines (UCCP) - Bradford on February 11, 2024.

item.title: Science and Math Month: Curiosity Stirs Discoveries
item.description: From mere atoms, we have evolved into the powerful civilizations we inhabit today. As you stand amidst this technological age, have you wondered, “How did we get here?”. The plethora of theories, equations, and formulas aid us in our routines and understanding of the world.

item.title: The Gymnasium Heats Up as the Elementary Boy's Badminton Championship Game Takes Place
item.description: February 14th, the day the elementary boys’ badminton took place. After winning the semi-finals, both Nathan Quinapondan from the Grade 6 and Karlisle from the Grade 5 fought in the championship game.
